sentences.en: Are you sure it will evaporate by morning?
sentences.cn: 你确定它在明天早晨之前会蒸发?

sentences.en: Blasting cold air over it makes the water evaporate.
sentences.cn: 向它喷射冷空气可以使水蒸发。

sentences.en: Crustal movements closed the straits, and the landlocked Mediterranean began to evaporate.
sentences.cn: 地壳运动封闭了海峡, 被陆地包围的地中海也开始蒸发.

sentences.en: Each shot of spray lingers on the beetle's body and may take several minutes to evaporate.
sentences.cn: 每次放射后残留在甲虫躯体上的液体要经过几分钟才挥发干净.

sentences.en: Evaporate the distilled water as you as did the tap water.
sentences.cn: 象先前你蒸发那自来水那样,把蒸馏水蒸发一下.

sentences.en: Heat is used to evaporate milk.
Hot spot can cause the oil falling on them to evaporate.
sentences.cn: 热点能导致油飘落在他们上面而蒸发.

sentences.en: If meteoric water does not evaporate or run overland, it may seep directly into the ground.
sentences.cn: 如果雨水不从陆地蒸发和流走的话, 就可能直接渗入地下.

sentences.en: If you evaporate a little sea water on a porcelain dish ; on cooling, crystals of common salt will deposit on the sides of the dish.
sentences.cn: 如果你将少许海水放到瓷盘中蒸发,冷却后就会有普通食盐的结晶附着在盘的四周.

sentences.en: It will evaporate like a spirit.
sentences.cn: 它将来总要像幽灵一样化成云烟.

sentences.en: Like many others, Handford was relieved to see the spectre of 15% interest rates evaporate by the end of the day.
sentences.cn: 和其他很多人一样，当看到15%的利率的阴霾随着那天的结束而散尽时，汉德福感到一阵欣慰。

sentences.en: Most of the water had evaporated.
Some propellant droplets may not evaporate within the confines of the thrust chamber.
sentences.cn: 有些推进剂可能在推力室内并未汽化.

sentences.en: The sun evaporates moisture on the leaves.
sentences.cn: 太阳会蒸发叶子上的水分。

sentences.en: We need to evaporate it down to a proper consistency.
sentences.cn: 我们需使它蒸发,变得黏稠些.

sentences.en: Wet pavements soon dry when there is wind or sunshine to evaporate the water.
sentences.cn: 当有风或阳光蒸发水时潮湿的人行道很快就干了.

sentences.en: While water evaporate, a large amount of heat is absorbed.
sentences.cn: 水蒸发时, 大量的热被吸收了.
